name: 2022 the 5th International Conference on Robot Systems and Applications
content: Proceedings: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers, after proper registration and presentation, will be published into ICRSA 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
